item.title: Yes Abolish Colombus Day
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Yes Abolish Colombus Day
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: "When we fight and create, we say to our fallen companeros,...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

"When we fight and create, we say to our fallen companeros, 'you did not die when they killed you." -Eduardo Galleano

Join us for the 20th anniversary of the Four Directions All Nations March to celebrate the abolishment of Columbus day, to honor our Indigenous relatives who are still resisting the violence of colonialism and genocide, and to remember that we were once free Peoples, and we will be free again.
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Yesterday myfriend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Yesterday myfriend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having two delicate surgeries done at the same time, one to treat a hernia and the other to treat cancer in her kidney. She is an immigrant mother who has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills for the anesthesia. We’re asking for community to support her so we can take a little stress off her life. We are also asking for you to keep her in your thoughts and prayers today. Her family is so grateful for the community support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be entering surgery. She will be having 2 surgeries done at the same time that are very delicate, one hernia and cancer in a kidney. She is an immigrant mother that has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills. We ask the help of the community to help her so we could take off a little stress off her life. We are also asking for support that it all goes well, her family will be very grateful that the community will give this support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Prayers for Christopher Savin and Guadalupe Urquidez
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be entering surgery. She will be having 2 surgeries done at the same time that are very delicate, one hernia and cancer in a kidney. We ask the help of the community to help her so we could take off a little stress off her life. We are also asking for support that it all goes well, her family will be very grateful that the community will give this support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Prayers for Christopher Savin and Guadalupe Urquidez

item.title: 10 years back stop same place justice for Alonzo Ashley
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Ten years after Alonzo Ashley was killed by Denver police at the Denver Zoo, the zoo dedicated a water fountain and cooling station in his name as part of a restorative justice agreement with his f…

denverpost.com

“We are really sorry”: 10 years after a man lost his life at the hands of police at the Denver Zoo, an apology comes

Ten years after Alonzo Ashley was killed by Denver police at the Denver Zoo, the zoo dedicated a water fountain and cooling station in his name as part of a restorative justice agreement with his f…Ten years after Alonzo Ashley was killed by Denver police at the Denver Zoo, the zoo dedicated a water fountain and cooling station in his name as part of a restorative justice agreement with his f…
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: 10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today we come back to the same place to keep honoring his life and supporting his family. It doesn’t matter how much time passes by, we will keep remembering the life of every person of color, black and brown, that has been killed in the hands of police. One day we will end with this practice of abuse, creating legislations to take away the protection of all those corrupt police officers that think that just because they have a badge, it gives them permission to kill our people. Marking the life of families, we will keep marching in the streets to end police brutality.
